metadata.title: CVE-2021-45958 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
UltraJSON (aka ujson) through 5.1.0 has a stack-based buffer overflow inBuffer_AppendIndentUnchecked (called from encode). Exploitation can, forexample, use a large amount of indentation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45958` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-ujson - 1.35-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ujson package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.35-4ubuntu0.1').
pandas package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
